name: Redirect Pain
description:
applies a damage preventing Barrier and then begins reflecting damage back to your attackers if the Barrier is broken. Effects scale with Pips spent.

1 Pip: Gain 400 Barrier and 15% Retribution for 6 seconds
2 Pips: Gain 650 Barrier and 25% Retribution for 9 seconds
3 Pips: Gain 900 Barrier and 35% Retribution for 12 seconds
4 Pips: Gain 1150 Barrier and 45% Retribution for 15 seconds
5 Pips: Gain 1400 Barrier and 55% Retribution for 18 seconds
